p: Valentine Faure Bardon and Laurent Salomon have nothing to disclose.Marianne Leruez‐Ville reports non‐financial support from Biomérieux, other from Biomérieux, non‐financial support from Abbott, non‐financial support from Siemens, outside the submitted work.Yves Ville reports non‐financial support from Ferring SAS, non‐financial support from Siemens health Care, non‐financial support from GE medical, outside the submitted work.
